title: "What is the story of Milarepa's survival on the snowy mountain and his magical abilities?"
first_phrase: In the following text, the Tibetan yogi Milarepa shares his experiences of transcending physical limitations using his magical abilities. In the last 200 tokens, Milarepa recounts his time spent in solitude, enduring the harsh elements of the snowy mountains, and defeating the demon of the snow. Milarepa emerges to a jubilant crowd of faithful followers, whom he regales with his experiences and doctrine. He describes the incredible blizzard that gripped the mountains, burying everything in a luminous fog of snow for days and nights. The landscape transformed before his eyes, with trees bending under the weight of snow and mountains turning white.

last_phrase: In the midst of the snowy storm, Milarepa fought fiercely and emerged victorious, his clothing torn and his beard wet with melting snow. Despite the power of the elements, he persevered and triumphed over the tempest. May his example inspire us to overcome our own challenges, no matter how daunting they may seem.
